https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jQns5P59ZuSKL1XfOAGAqfKJewz.jpg When Sonoko enters a traditional Japanese arranged marriage with Amamiya facilitated by her parents the resulting union is loveless including the functional and goal-oriented sex. When the husband and wife move for his work she falls for her husband's boss and takes on the role of a betrayer. A Flower Aflame
